job_description: data science job for the role Client Engineering AI Engineer
data science job for the role Production Planner

• Experience with a cloud environment and services (e.
• A background in biology is not required, but curiosity and scientific interest is.
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or scientific discipline and 2 years of software development OR 4 years of professional experience building software.
• Experience developing web applications in React and Redux.
• Experience with shipping and maintaining software.
• Strong understanding of computer science fundamentals (e.
• Data structures, space and time complexity) Deep understanding of testing, build, continuous integration, deployment & continuous monitoring.
• AWS) Willingness to solve problems irrespective of where it is in the tech stack.

• Execute production operations according to defined procedures and ensure the integrity and quality of our products Ability to operate and maintain laboratory to clean room standards required in the production of Life Science products Process work orders accurately using an ERP system in a timely manner Maintenance of production batch records and good documentation under ISO requirement Accurate tracking of production data, test data and inventory Assembly of 10x consumables and finished goods both manually and using semi-automated packaging equipment Ability to set up and operate packaging equipment and handle simple troubleshooting Perform preventive maintenance on some lab equipment Provide feedback to improve process quality and efficiency Identify issues occurring in production labs and escalate issues to supervisor’s or MSE’s attention High school education / Associate Degree or above Strong team player and detail oriented Good communication skills Ability to read and understand SOPs and equipment user manual Ability to enter data into electronic tracking systems like Excel Ability to multi-task and prioritize work load to meet strict deadlines under supervision Good documentation skills and ability to write procedures and reports Desire to be part of a rapidly evolving organization and taking products and processes to the next level Ability to lift up to 15 pounds and potentially stand or sit for up to 3 hour increments Experience in automation and packaging of Life Science products, Food Packaging products or related field preferred Relevant experience in a production environment working with standard production control tools – ERP, inventory control, and work orders Experience training employees on production processes defined in production batch records and work instructions Experience writing and revising work instructions and production batch records Experienced in communicating and collaborating with production departments Quality Systems Software Pleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwarePosted 13 days ago.

• Engaging external vendors to integrate their solutions into 10X codebase Designing and developing embedded control software and firmware for cutting edge high-throughput biological instrumentation platforms Working with electrical engineers to develop functional drivers and appropriate control schemes and interfaces Negotiating/determining prototype requirements with design engineers from partner teams (e.
• Mechanical Engineering, Optical Engineering, Electrical Engineering) Designing and implementing automated test scripts built on top of your control software Contributing to the entire software lifecycle from requirements gathering to validation Writing well structured, testable, efficient and maintainable software Writing software to control hardware prototypes Writing drivers and low level hardware control software Developing application level business logic (e.
• Dispense, measure, aspirate) Developing small but interactive engineering GUIs For example: given hardware you have never used, quickly write a python interface to control it Working experience with Machine Vision or Scientific cameras, GenICam/GenTL stack over USB3Vision, GigE Vision, CXP, CameraLink Grasp of the basics of classical control theory and experience implementing control algorithms (e.
• ) Rapid software prototyping & validation with attention to detail and engineering diligence Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Strong verbal and written communication skills Formal approach to design & architecture of complex instruments/systems Background in biology and DNA sequencing is not required.
• Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, math, or scientific discipline with 4 years experience.
• OR Master’s degree with 2 years of experience in software development Embedded/Firmware Development Modern C++ Python3 Linux Senior Software Engineer, Instrument Software Pleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwarePosted 13 days agoStaff Software EngineerPleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwareRemotePosted 21 days agoSenior Software Engineer, Infrastructure EngineeringPleasanton, California, USA HQIT & Productivity EngineeringPosted 7 months agoSenior Software Engineer, AI SolutionsCalifornia, USA (Remote)Engineering - SoftwarePosted 3 months agoStaff Software Engineer, AI SolutionsCalifornia, USA (Remote)Engineering - SoftwarePosted 3 months agoSoftware Engineer III, FrontendPleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - SoftwarePosted 2 months agoStaff Mechanical Engineer, Precision Motion ControlPleasanton, California, USA HQEngineering - HardwarePosted 2 months agoSenior Security Engineer, CloudPleasanton, California, USA HQIT & Productivity EngineeringHybridPosted 19 days agoSenior Manufacturing Test Engineer (Contractor) (P-4758)Pleasanton, California, USA HQScientificPosted a month agoSenior Manufacturing Engineer (Contractor) (P-4757)Pleasanton, California, USA HQScientificPosted a month ago.
• Designing, profiling, optimizing and troubleshooting image acquisition pipelines, moving gigabytes of data per second.
• PID, lead-lag, MPC) Exposure to digital signals processing (DSP) such as simple signal conditioning (e.

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or similar field.
• A Master’s degree will be preferred.
• Proven experience as an AI Engineer or similar role in software development.
• Experience in Data Science and building and deploying AI models.
• Strong programming skills in Python, Java, or other programming languages.
• Experience with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch).
• Experience in utilizing and deploying AI solutions in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure).
• Analyze and understand AI/Machine Learning application requirements.

• Normalization and denormalization Knowledge of data extraction, transformation, and loading using tools Design and implementation of scalable data warehouses and data lakes Ability to design efficient data solutions based on business needs Excellent communication and leadership skills, with the ability to engage with both technical and non-technical stakeholders Active DoD Secret Clearance Bachelor's degree in computer science, data science, information systems, or a related field Automate metadata extraction using ML Validate AI/ML pipelines and produce readiness reports Ensure explainability, drift detection, and compliance in testbeds Support data-driven innovation for clinical and operational analytics Experience supporting the DoD or other federal agencies in a data-centric role A Master’s degree is preferred but not required Expertise in NLP, OCR, and DoD AI guidelines Familiarity with Advana’s analytics tools.
• Understanding of conceptual, logical, and physical data models.

• Experience in data engineering, data science, or machine learning roles.
• Hands-on experience in deploying and maintaining machine learning models in production environments.
• Experience in distributed computing frameworks (PySpark, Hadoop)Experience with advanced AI technologies such as transformers, LLMs, and GANs.
• Experience in semiconductor manufacturing and/or high-volume manufacturing Design, develop, and optimize scalable ETL pipelines to process large-scale structured and unstructured datasets.
• Create and manage efficient data architectures that support analytics and machine learning needs.
• Employ advanced AI methodologies, including transformers, LLMs, and GANs, to address business requirements.
• Adapt to project requirements by serving as a Data Engineer, Data Scientist, or ML Engineer, leveraging expertise across disciplines.
• Team player and self-starter Bachelor’s and/or Master’s with multiple years of directly relevant experience in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or a closely related field.

• Master’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Machine Learning, or a related STEM disciplineStrong proficiency in Python and solid knowledge of SQLHands-on experience with machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn)Proven ability to design, train, and deploy ML/AI models in production environmentsStrong understanding of statistics, algorithms, and data structuresExcellent communication skills to explain technical concepts to business stakeholders Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)Familiarity with financial data and quantitative modelingExposure to NLP, LLMs, or reinforcement learningBackground in MLOps or experience deploying large-scale AI systems Competitive Salary: $120k - $170k (DOE)Career Growth: Pathways to senior and leadership roles in a rapidly evolving AI teamInnovation Focus: Opportunity to work with cutting-edge tools shaping the finance industryFlexibility: Hybrid or on-site working options in DallasCollaborative Culture: Join a team that values creativity, forward-thinking, and impact-driven solutions.
• Design and deploy AI models: Develop and optimize machine learning and deep learning systems for financial applications.
• Build intelligent solutions: Create algorithms that automate processes, enhance risk management, and unlock actionable insights.
• Collaborate across teams: Work closely with data scientists, engineers, and finance experts to integrate AI into core business platforms.
• Ensure scalability and performance: Deploy models into production environments with robust monitoring and reliability.
• Stay ahead of the curve: Research and apply emerging AI trends, from natural language processing to generative models.

job_title: Applied Data Scientist, Analytics & Insights, Americas
job_description:
• Proven experience in an analytics or data science role.
• Rigorous and structured analytical problem solving skills with deep understanding of how to use data to measure and drive business operations.
• Exceptional communication skills, with the ability to tell data-driven stories and influence key collaborators across senior levels of the organization.
• Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Math, Physics or other related field or equivalent work experience Experience in consulting, or with top-tier consumer or tech brands would be an advantage.
• Strong commercial competence with the ability to translate data into business impact and drive commercial decisions.
• Proficient with analytics tools and techniques (e.
• , SQL, Python, AI, and data visualization platforms like Power BI, Looker or Tableau).
• Ability to work collaboratively and cross-functionally to embed analytics in the decision-making process across multiple departments.

• Ability to design and implement AI tools in Go (nice to have)Experience in at least one ML framework, such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.
• Experience building solutions involving algorithms, optimization, reinforcement learning, artificial neural networks, discrete event simulation and case based reasoningAbility to execute with little oversight and to solve problems quicklyExperience with function/path optimization and some of the more common algorithms – linear programming, BOBYQA, A* Search, simulated annealingAdvanced degree in a quantitative field Solve problems using mechanistic, bottom-up thinking and statistical, top-down approachesDevelop novel mechanisms by which to optimize supply chainBuild and improve the intelligence behind our logistics simulations and market optimization algorithmsImplement and ship models to predict the demand for commodities at nodes in a logistics network, the availability of supply, estimated arrival times, delays and more Competitive compensation packageHealth, Dental and Vision Insurance401k with matchingCompany paid life and short-term disability insuranceCompany paid parking or transit passRelocation offered when applicableModern office space in downtown DenverDaily coffee, tea, drinks & snacksTeam happy hours.
